DataSource.Query: SELECT purchase.quotations.quotation_id, purchase.quotations.transaction_timestamp, purchase.quotations.value_date, account.get_name_by_user_id(purchase.quotations.user_id) AS entered_by, core.get_office_name_by_office_id(purchase.quotations.office_id) AS office_name, purchase.quotations.terms, purchase.quotations.internal_memo, inventory.get_supplier_name_by_supplier_id(purchase.quotations.supplier_id) AS supplier_name FROM purchase.quotations WHERE purchase.quotations.quotation_id = @quotation_id;

SELECT purchase.quotation_details.item_id, inventory.items.item_code, inventory.items.item_name, purchase.quotation_details.quantity, inventory.get_unit_name_by_unit_id(purchase.quotation_details.unit_id) AS unit, purchase.quotation_details.price, purchase.quotation_details.price * purchase.quotation_details.quantity AS amount, purchase.quotation_details.discount_rate, ROUND((purchase.quotation_details.price * purchase.quotation_details.quantity) * ((100 - purchase.quotation_details.discount_rate)/100), 4) AS total FROM purchase.quotation_details INNER JOIN inventory.items ON inventory.items.item_id = purchase.quotation_details.item_id WHERE purchase.quotation_details.quotation_id = @quotation_id ORDER BY purchase.quotation_details.quotation_detail_id;
